It runs up to theGemsand starts speaking toSteven. Instead of putting up a fight, the Gems merely absorb it into the Light Prism, much to Steven's displeasure.

name: Shep
description: Shep is portrayed as friendly, laid-back, and supportive. They also demonstrate being level-headed and empathetic, as whenSteventrapped everyone in his dome Shep suggested that the reason Steven did it was out of fear of losing his friends as they moved on with their lives. They also proved to be reassuring, successfully calming down Steven and affirming that his friendships will endure. Notably, Shep exhibits no further hostility following the incident.

name: Yellowtail
description: Yellowtail, like his son Onion, speaks in gibberish but seemingly intelligible language, as revealed in "Onion Trade". He cares a lot about Onion, but his job as a sailor leaves him with little time to see him. He may be a somewhat old-fashioned father, as he seems to want his step-son Sour Cream to follow in his footsteps as a fisherman, instead of following his dreams of being a DJ. However, despite their somewhat strained relationship, he still cares a lot about his step-son, which eventua...

name: Crystal Mouse
description: In the second story of Issue 6, "Lion's Share," Lion brings the slobbery Crystal Mouse to Pearl and places it in her hands. At first, she is disgusted, but she quickly realizes that he is trying to bring her gifts because he likes her. As he nuzzles up against her, the throws the mouse's lifeless body into a waste bin.

name: Big Bird
description: The Big Bird takes the form of a massive bird-like creature with large, broad wings, thin, stick-like legs, and a comparatively small tail. She has brown feathers covering almost all of her body with purple plumage on her chest and belly. She has a huge jagged beak that extends to her forehead and is able to hold a large number of objects and has no visible eyes. Her interior is encrusted with gemstones that are encased bybubbles.

name: Sugilite
description: Sugilite is a colossal and menacing fusion with a stocky, bulky build and four arms (each pair seeming to share a shoulder joint), with black markings on them. She features four, medium-lilac eyes located under a strong brow and a fifth one above it. Her mouth is twisted into a grin and filled with sharp, pointed teeth. She has a giant plume of spiky, dark purple-black hair kept in an untamed style similar to Amethyst's, but messier. Her skin color is lavender, like Amethyst's. In close-ups o...

attributes.Friend(S: Steven Universe

name: Aquamarine
description: Despite her childlike voice and demeanor, Aquamarine is an accomplished and ruthless Gem. She takes an authoritative stance due to her ego, ordering Topaz to act as muscle for their assigned mission, as revealed in "I Am My Mom". LikePeridotbefore her betrayal, Aquamarine is directive, focused, and unconcerned with anything unrelated to her mission, ignoring the remainingCrystal Gemsin favor of capturing the humans close toSteven. This indifferent attitude extends toward her enemies, using he...

name: Light Army
description: The army was sealed inside the Light Prism sometime beforeGarnet,Pearl, andAmethystrecovered it inAttack the Light. They allowedStevento grab it for a moment, unleashing the first creature of the army,White Light, whose death released the other notable members of the army.

name: Vine Monsters
description: Stevenand the Crystal Gems were fighting these creatures in the middle of a rocky terrain, withOnionwatching while eating popcorn. Things take a sudden turn when one of the creatures shoots a teleportation beam, beaming away theGems. They then turn towards Onion and slap the bag out of his hands. He gives them a death stare and by the time Steven and the others returned, the monsters were cowering behind a rock while Onion waves hello, to Steven's surprise.

name: Centipeetles
description: The Centipeetles are large, centipede-like entities that are produced by the corrupted Nephrite. They appear to be very similar to the corrupted Nephrite, sans the mane and crystal-like growth covering on each segment. The Centipeetles are smaller compared to the corrupted Nephrite, primarily composed of seven different segments. The upper portion of the Centipeetle is covered in a "chitinous", bumpy, dark green exoskeleton throughout its body, with a single pair of legs of the same color. Th...
